posts.post_content:
Heritage Druid + Elf token prodution (eg. Elvish Promenade) + Rys + HeNacatl War-Pride.
  
The War-Pride tokens that Rhys puts in don't come into play tapped & attacking nor do they leave play at end of turn.
  
I'm loving this

posts.post_content:
If you can get the mana and the right cards,
  
Making a token copy of this guy is just too much fun.
  
But, aside from that little dream,
  
Since he embodies both token colors,
  
There is no reason not to throw this guy into any of your token decks (aside from colors, of course).
  
An amazing addition to any situation,
  
And even funnier with [Doubling Season](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Doubling Season).
posts.html:

But, aside from that little dream,

An amazing addition to any situation,
